page.title: 18ONE DAY IN DAVIOT.(CTD)
page.content:
9.15a.m.-12.30p.m. Work in school with a quarter of an hour break.
12.30p.m.-Lunch. 1.30p.m.-Back to work.
3p.m.-Little ones go home.
3.30p.m.-Time to go home-At last!Into the school taxi.
4.00p.m.-Arrive home.Have a quick snack,do home work and go out to play or watch T.V. 6.00-6.30p.m.-Dinner with the family.
7.00p.m.-Watch T.V. or go to a club--badminton,youth club,girl guides or play games on the computer.
9.00p.m.-Get washed and go to bed.Read a book and ZZZZZZZ--SLEEP! GOODNIGHT!
